contextId.information: "reasonable." This can be stated as a complete sentence. "He must think in wise ways" (UDB) (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
"friendly to strangers." This can be stated as a complete sentence. AT: "He must welcome strangers" (UDB) (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
This can be stated as a complete sentence. AT: "He must not be someone who likes to fight and argue" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
The understood information can be stated clearly. AT: "but he is especially the Savior of those people who believe" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
